CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Opportunity__r.Additional_Order_ID2__c) , IF(ISBLANK(Opportunity__r.Additional_Order_ID1__c) , Opportunity__r.Order_ID__c , Opportunity__r.Order_ID__c & ", " & Opportunity__r.Additional_Order_ID1__c ), Opportunity__r.Order_ID__c & ", " & Opportunity__r.Additional_Order_ID1__c & ", " & Opportunity__r.Additional_Order_ID2__c )
CustomField.label: Order ID
